description: Adjust directed graphs to improve the layout aspect ratio. Graphviz filters: acyclic, bcomps, comps, edgepaint, gvcolor, gvpack, mingle, nop, sccmap, tred, & unflatten. More information: https://www.graphviz.org/pdf/unflatten.1.pdf.

useCases.description: Adjust one or more directed graphs to improve the layout aspect ratio:
Use unflatten as a preprocessor for dot layout to improve aspect ratio:
